description.value:
Aura 5

Allies within the aura gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls and a +5 bonus to damage rolls against bloodied targets.
Viktor regains 5 hit points whenever he starts his turn and has at least 1 hit point. When he takes damage from a silvered weapon, his regeneration does not function on his next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Requirement: Viktor must be in dire wolf or hybrid form.

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+15 vs. AC, or + 17 against a bloodied target

Hit: 2d10 + 5 damage, or 2d10 + 10 against a bloodied target, and the target falls prone.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ disease

Standard

Requirement: Viktor must be in dire wolf or hybrid form.

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+15 vs. AC, or + 17 against a bloodied target

Hit: 1d12 + 10 damage. At the end of the encounter, the target makes a saving throw. On a failure, the target contracts greater werewolf moon frenzy (stage 1).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ weapon

Standard

Requirement: Viktor must be in human or hybrid form.

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+15 vs. AC, or + 17 against a bloodied target.

Hit: 2d10 + 6 damage, or 2d10 + 11 against a bloodied target.

At-Will

Standard

Requirement: Viktor must be in hybrid form.

Effect: Viktor makes two melee basic attacks. Then Viktor takes 5 damage.

Recharge 5-6

Standard

Requirement: Viktor must be in dire wolf form.

Effect: Viktor can shift up to 6 squares and then use bite.

At-Will ✦ polymorph

Minor

Effect: Viktor alters his physical form to appear as a unique human, a Large dire wolf, or a Large hybrid. If he assumes Large size from Medium size, he pushes each creature adjacent to him 1 square. He remains in this form until he uses change shape again or until he drops to 0 hit points.

Encounter

Minor

Effect: Close burst 10 (allies in the burst). The target gains 10 temporary hit points. Then, if the target has bite, it can use bite as a free action.

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: An adjacent enemy hits Viktor with a melee attack using a melee weapon.

Effect (Immediate Reaction): Viktor makes a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy.

system.biography:
HP 252; Bloodied 126Init +6 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 22Fort 24Ref 20Will 21
Speed 6 (8 in wolf form)
Ability ScoresStr 21 (+10)
Con 16 (+8)		Dex 12 (+6)
Int 14 (+7)		Wis 15 (+7)
Cha 17 (+8)
Languages Common
Alignment Evil
Skills Athletics +15, Bluff +13, Endurance +13, Intimidate +13Senses Low-light vision
Passive Perception 17 | Insight 17

Equipment greatsword , hide armor .

Traits
